_header: In Egypt whilom as I read and find
_description: John Lydgate, Fabula duorum mercatorum — 130 stanzas rhyme royal, including Envoy

BodRawPoe32.First Lines:
IN Egipt whilom as I reede and fyndether dwellid a Marchaunt of hih
                    and gret sttat…
BodRawPoe32.Last Lines:
…Rith in to Egipt he is gon a geynOf heer freendschip what
                    shold y you more seeyn
BodRawPoe32.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,  and  Gustav Schleich.  
             Lydgate’s Fabula duorum mercatorum.
Quellen und Forschungen
         83. Strassburg: Trübner, 1897.

CULHh412.First Lines:
In Egipt whilom as I rede and fyndthere dwellyd a marchand of hygh
                    & gret estate…
CULHh412.Last Lines:
…thys my desire in all degres of menthat it so be I pray
                    ȝow sey amen finit

BLAdd34360.First Lines:
[I]N egipt whilom as I rede and fyndeThere dwellid a Merchaunt of
                    high and grete Renoun
estate…
BLAdd34360.Last Lines:
…This is my desire in al degrees of menThat it so be I pray
                    you sey al Amen
BLAdd34360.Attributed Title:
Explicit ffabula virorum Mercatorum / De et super gestis Romanorum
                    (f. 18v)
BLAdd34360.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,  and  Gustav Schleich.  
             Lydgate’s Fabula duorum mercatorum.
Quellen und Forschungen
         83. Strassburg: Trübner, 1897.
